title: Girl, 17, shot in knee on northeast side of Indianapolis
content:
INDIANAPOLIS (WTHR) - A teenage girl is in good condition after she was shot in the knee Monday night.
The shooting happened around 10:30 p.m. Monday in the 4300 block of Priscilla Avenue on the northeast side of Indianapolis. Police say the 17-year-old was taken to Eskenazi Health in good condition.
There was no word about a motive or suspect at this time.
